Articles.Content:
I happened to land next to this nice hill with my rover and I decided to see how high I could jump it. No .cfg edits, no rocket engines, just ramping off a hill. I managed to hit 559m off the ground and decided this would make a fun challenge. How high can you jump using Tosh\'s cart? No rocket engines or RCS, just finding a big hill and driving at it as fast as you can.

Oh yah, you must survive the landing and come to a stop.

Edit: Added video.
I will try this, when low detail terrain doesn\'t have me fall through it but, cool challenge and, EPIC JUMP!
